text:
Being a one-on-one student in international schooling has been a really different but cool experience. I get to learn at my own pace, and the teacher actually focuses just on me, which helps a lot. If I don’t understand something, I can ask right away, and we go over it until I get it. That’s something I didn’t always get in regular school.

It’s also nice that the schedule is flexible. I can plan my day better and still have time for hobbies or just relaxing. I’ve definitely improved in subjects I used to struggle with, and I feel more confident now.

Overall, I think one-on-one international schooling is great if you like personalized learning and a quieter environment.

As someone who's been a student at International Schooling for four years, all I can say is that it made my life a lot easier in many ways. I have a lot of time for myself and my hobbies, can choose to study anything I'd like from the variety of courses we have provided, and university applications/interviews run a lot smoother as a senior in this school. It's truly a wonderful school with many opportunities for curious students!

Awesome School with Supportive Teachers

I really enjoy studying with International Schooling. The lessons are clear, interesting, and easy to understand. The teachers are always helpful and quick to respond whenever I have questions. It’s a great option if you want a flexible and enjoyable learning experience.

Being a student here has been truly life-changing. The teachers genuinely care about my success, offering constant support and encouragement. The flexibility of online learning has allowed me to balance my life and studies while still receiving top-quality education. I feel seen and valued every day. This school has not only helped me grow academically but also given me the confidence to succeed in the future. I'm proud to be a part of this incredible school.

Teaching at International Schooling has been an incredibly rewarding experience! As an online teacher, I love the flexibility and innovation that comes with virtual education. The students are diverse, engaged, and eager to learn from all corners of the world.

What truly sets International Schooling apart is the supportive and kind administration—they value teachers, encourage collaboration, and ensure we have the tools we need to succeed. I'm proud to be part of a global learning community that puts students first and empowers educators.
